name: Feature Request Extraction Configuration
description: Configuration for extracting feature requests from Google Play reviews

review_text.description: The full text of the review to analyze

max_features.description: Maximum number of feature requests to extract

feature_requests.description: List of feature requests extracted from the review

clarity.description: How clearly the feature request is expressed

impact.description: Potential impact of implementing the feature

implementation_difficulty.description: Estimated difficulty of implementing the feature

implementation_approach.description: Suggested steps for implementing the feature

competing_apps.description: Competing apps mentioned that already have the requested features

features.description: Features the competing app has that were requested

urgency_assessment.description: Assessment of the urgency of implementing the requested features

input.review_text: I've been using this app for months and it's almost perfect for my needs. Would love to see dark mode support and the ability to export my data to CSV. Also, it would be great if it could sync with my Google Calendar. The competitor app 'TaskMaster' already has these features and I'm considering switching if these aren't added soon.

implementation_approach: Add a theme toggle in settings
Add export button in data view screens
Create service to format data into CSV structure
Implement file saving using device's native sharing options
Add options for selecting date ranges and data categories
Use Google Calendar API for bidirectional sync

urgency_assessment.reasoning: User explicitly mentions considering switching to a competitor if features aren't added soon, indicating high risk of customer loss.
